about_the_game:
Whisker Squadron:Untitled Space Game is the second game in the Whisker Squadron universe, and will land on Steam in 2025 (with a real name!). You can read about it below. In the meantime, check out Whisker Squadron: Survivor - a more streamlined corridor shooter with roguelite survival elements, featuring the same cast of feline pilots by visiting our Developer page.

Engage in epic space combat with your feline pilot of choice! You'll explore free-roaming space zones filled with opportunity and peril

Take on epic bosses at the end of each of 3 acts

Outfit your high tech ship with your feline pilot of choice, and choose your path through an ever-changing galaxy that's uniquely generated for each 60-minute run. Explore space for loot and opportunities, upgrade your equipment along the way, and try to survive the depths of space while fending off the Swarm. Orbit tiny moons and clear them of bosses, preserve your fuel, and try to make it to the end of the map in one piece.

Key Features

Procedurally generated, rogue-like mission structure that's unique every time you play
Experience free-roaming space-based "exploration zones"
Choose your pilots from a cast of 5 feline heroes
Dozens of unique weapons, ship augmentations, and items to unlock

name: Whisker Squadron: Untitled Space Game

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: The second title in the Whisker Squadron universe takes the fight to the cosmos! A free roaming roguelike featuring tense battles in open space, sprawling Swarm factories, remote stations with quests and shops, moons infested with bosses, and a fantastically colorful vision of outer space.
